attributes.action: make public the expenditure of MPs and House of Commons employees and their offices and staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the revelations surrounding Derek Conway would the Prime Minister please do the right thing and demand that all MPs and House of Commons staff, all who are ultimately funded by we the taxpayer, make public their detailed expenditure complete with details of who they employ within their constituency offices.
